### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5, 70.5)
- **Electric mining drill** at (15.5, 70.5) extracting iron ore (output blocked)
- **Burner inserter** at (17.5, 72.5) moving ore to belts (output blocked)
- **Transport belts** connecting drill to inserter and furnace (blocked at 15.5,72.5)
- **Stone furnace** at (16.0, 74.0) for smelting iron ore (out of fuel)
- **Wooden chest** at (-47.5, 74.5) for storage

#### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-46.5, 70.5)
- **Electric mining drill** at (-46.5, 70.5) extracting copper ore (output blocked)
- **Burner inserter** at (-48.5, 72.5) moving ore to belts (waiting for source items)
- **Transport belts** connecting drill to inserter and furnace
- **Stone furnace** at (-46.0, 74.0) for smelting copper ore (out of fuel)

#### Power Generation Setup at (-21.5, 70.5)
- **Offshore pump** at (-21.5, 70.5) supplying water (working)
- **Boiler** at (-25.0, 80.5) converting water to steam (fueled)
- **Steam engine** at (-25.5, 89.5) for power generation (connected and working)
- **Pipe network** connecting these components (fluid system 381 for water, 384 for steam)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Distance-Related Errors
- Move within 10 tiles of target before placing entities (repeated attempts at 60+ tile distances)
- When working with distant setups, teleport or walk closer before attempting modifications

#### Placement and Connection Errors
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces - must use inserters as intermediaries
- Clear existing entities before placing new ones (attempted to place on occupied belt at 15.5,72.5)
- Adjust spacing/direction when placement fails due to collisions (failed inserter placement near furnace)

#### Inventory and Throughput Issues
- Clear blocked transport belts to allow inserter operation (multiple blocked outputs reported)
- Monitor belt inventories to prevent congestion (iron belt at 15.5,72.5 has 46 iron ore backed up)
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and input materials (multiple furnaces reported out of fuel)

#### Entity Interaction Errors
- Verify entity exists before attempting interaction (failed to get wooden chest at -47.5,72.5)
- Check inventory capacity before inserting items (failed to insert coal into full inserter)

#### Power System Optimization
- Maintain fuel supply to boilers and furnaces
- Monitor power network connections to ensure full coverage
- Address warnings about blocked outputs promptly
